|brand = Securifi |model = Almond |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = + ALMP-BLK-US (2014) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, smart home hub, IoT hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = AHLALP |icid = 10114A-ALP |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cortina Systems;CS7542; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 750 MHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Z-Wave, ZigBee, Touchscreen |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Power Amplifier;RFaxis (Skyworks);RFX2411;;6; ,,, ZigBee Mesh Networking SoC;Silicon Labs;EM357;;1; ,,, Z-Wave Serial Interface SoC;Sigma Designs;SD3503A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 10.10.10.254 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = via Kickstarter |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/08/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 99 |upc = 848859000105 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA9H962M3930 |asin = B00R0C2U5E |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9580; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device was crowdfunded via a [https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home '''Kickstarter''' which ran in early 2013].
*[http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/securifi-almond-80211ac-wireless-smart-router-aims-to-revolutionize-the-smart-home-era-185998012.html Press release via '''PR NewsWire''']
[[ZigBee]] and Z-Wave radios are included to allow the router :to function as a home automation platform. *"CN1F-B" is silkscreened on the FCC EUT's main board. *"CN1F-T" is silkscreened on the port expansion board. While the manuf. of this unit is not currently known, the manuf. :of the non-plus Almond [http://www.tradesparq.com/Customs/1135155/Customs-Data-Securifi-Ltd seems to have been '''Wintec'''].
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32698-securifi-almondplus-reviewed ''Securifi Almond+'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] <small>(29 Apr 2015)</small> :'''CPU:''' [[Cortina Systems]] CS7542 @750MHz :'''Switch:''' [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (GbE) :'''WLAN 2.4GHz:''' [[Atheros]] AR9580 (3T3R 802.11bgn) :'''WLAN 5GHz:''' [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880-BR4A :2.4/5GHz Power Amplifier: ''[http://www.skyworksinc.com/Products_RFX.aspx RFaxis]'' ([[Skyworks]]) 2x (x3) :'''[[ZigBee]] Radio:''' ''Silicon Labs'' EM357 (ARM Cortex-M3) :192kB flash, 12kB RAM, 24x GPIO, QFN48 package :'''Z-Wave Radio:''' ''Sigma Designs'' 3-series module
===Additional external links=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/7700/securifis-almond-platform-update-integrates-cortina-soc-with-qca-radios ''Securifi's Almond+ Platform Update'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2414040,00.asp ''CES 2013: Securifi's Almond+ Router'' on '''PC|Mag'''] *[https://www.cortina-systems.com/technology/item/996-cs7542-cs7522 ''CS7542/CS7522'' Product page on '''Cortina Systems''']
==Notes== ===Technical Specifications=== *Dual Band Concurrent: 802.11abgn/ac (AC1750) *4x Gigabit LAN + 1x Gigabit WAN Ports + 2x USB 3.0 *Home Automation: ZigBee HA 1.2, Z-Wave *VPN Server, Port Forwarding, DMZ, UPnP, USB File sharing *Free iOS & Android Apps & Browser UI *Range: 50-200 ft. (depends on construction) *Power Supply: DC 12V, 2.5A (Input: AC 110~220V, 50/60Hz)
====Multi-Purpose:==== :Router / Access Point / Range Extender / Wireless Bridge *Router or AP - works with any Internet modem from any provider *Range Extender - wirelessly extend your existing Wi-Fi network *Wireless Bridge - connect wired only devices to a Wi-Fi network
===Info from [https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home the Kickstarter campaign]=== * The original goal of $250,000 was surpassed by quite a bit :- it ended up at $855,625 * The standard color router sold for $95 (early bird) or $99 (normal) * Four colors were also available solely to Kickstarter contributors :- White, Blue, Green, and Red (each for $129) * The device was originally slated to use a '''Realtek''' platform * [https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home/posts/516625 The firmware was stated to be based on '''OpenWrt'''] * WiFi AC1750 radios were noted as [http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home/posts/682172?page=2#comments QCA9880 and AR9580] :[[Atheros]] AR9580 802.11b/g/n 3T3R <small>(450Mbps)</small> :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 802.11an/ac 3T3R <small>(1300Mbps)</small> * The most recent SoC used was confirmed as being sourced :from [http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home/posts/682172?cursor=5342190#comment-5342189 '''Cortina Systems'''] [http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home/posts/682172?cursor=5333514#comment-5333513 (CS7542/CS7522)] :CPU: [[Cortina Systems]] [https://www.cortina-systems.com/technology/item/996-cs7542-cs7522 CS7542] @750MHz Dual-Core [https://www.cortina-systems.com/technology/download/203/996/61 ARM Cortex-A9] :<small>3x PCIe, 3x RGMII, 4x SATAII, 2x USB 2.0, 4x UART, 5x SPI, 6x TS (Rx), SD, PCM, LCD</small> * Noted boards .. ** [https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home/posts/693536 2013-12] - "CN1C-B" (main board), "CN1C-T" (expansion board) ** [https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2037429657/almond-80211ac-touchscreen-wifi-router-smart-home/posts/611489 2013-09] - "CN1B-B" (main board), "CN1B-T" (expansion board), :::128 MiB Flash, 256 MiB RAM, 3.5" screen, 2x USB 3.0
[[Category:English Documentation]]
